mapper.select: SELECT c.country_id countryId, c.country_name countryName, r.region_id regionId, r.region_name regionName FROM countries c INNER JOIN regions r ON c.region_id = r.region_id ORDER BY r.region_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO countries (country_id, country_name, region_id) VALUES (#{countryId}, #{countryName}, #{regionId})
mapper.update: UPDATE countries SET country_name=#{countryName}, region_id=#{regionId} WHERE country_id=#{countryId}
